attributes.action: Cancel all wage rise Westminster MP’s are getting during pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Having parliamentary body approve wage rises while Normal UK workers are losing Jobs or being put on Furlough appears to be incompatible with current climate of economic climate
attributes.background: Until current Pandemic has been resolved via vaccination or other means, all wage rises of Sitting MP’s are frozen

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The Independent Parliamentary Standards Authority (IPSA) is responsible for deciding on MPs' expenses and pay. IPSA is independent of both Parliament and Government.

You can find out how to contact IPSA here:

http://www.theipsa.org.uk/about-us/contact-us/
